settings.text:
Welcome to the official SUFC Merchandise page. These are the official Merchandise products endorsed by the club.

Support the club by purchasing a quality item from this store.

settings.heading: Dream it – Design it – Wear it
settings.subheading:
Imagine your team running around in your favourite team colours,
kit design and unique jersey that you helped create.
Well, using our services, this is possible.
From initial design to concept, manufacturing and delivery, our custom and sublimation services are available to all clubs and teams,

and individuals.
Unlimited logos, names, numbers and in any Sport style

settings.heading: Nothing to Worry About
settings.subheading:
Anyone can search Ailibaba and find a manufacturer who promise the best and deliver the worst. At IS Apparel, we have representives at factory level to ensure quality and so you get what you asked for. With a very low MOQ, extremely quick turn-a-round times, it is now possible to fit out your social team, club or association. Let us use
our wealth experience in custom making sports apparel and work wear and take the head ache away from you.

Our manufacturing partners have worked closely with many local, national and international teams to ensure they walk onto the field or court not only looking great but feeling fantastic. Our fabrics are of the highest standard, our manufacturing processes as second to none and we
ensure that from design concept to delivery, everything will run smothely, on time and on budget
Contact us to find out more
